javadoc: Command for editing and removing comments at an address.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct command for setting all the different types of comments at an
 address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of code unit where comment will edited

methods.javadoc: The name of the edit action.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: The name of the edit action.

methods.name: commentChanged
methods.comment: return true if the newValue and oldValue are different

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the value that we desire to set

methods.javadoc:
Get the code unit from the program location provider.
@return CodeUnit null if there is no location provider.
methods.name: getCodeUnit
methods.comment: Get the code unit from the program location provider.

return.comment: CodeUnit null if there is no location provider.

name: SetCommentsCmd
comment: Command for editing and removing comments at an address.
